code:
--- title: PC Parts Tab - Flowchart --- flowchart TD Start([User opens PC Parts Tab]) SelectCategory[Select component category
- CPU
- Memory
- Motherboard
- Video Card
- Case
- Power Supply
- Storage
- Monitor] LoadAllParts[Load all parts for category] ShowFilterOptions[Show filter options
- Price range
- Manufacturer
- Specifications] UserInput{User input} %% Filter Path ApplyFilters[Apply selected filters] FilterResults[Filter parts list] %% Search Path SearchInput[Enter search query] SearchResults[Search in parts list] %% Sort Path SelectSort[Select sort option
- Price (Low to High)
- Price (High to Low)
- Name (A-Z)
- Name (Z-A)] SortResults[Sort parts list] DisplayParts[Display parts with pagination] UserAction{User action} ViewDetails[View part details
- Specifications
- Images
- Price
- Compatibility info] LoadMore[Load more parts
(pagination)] ResetFilters[Reset all filters] End([End]) Start --> SelectCategory SelectCategory --> LoadAllParts LoadAllParts --> ShowFilterOptions ShowFilterOptions --> UserInput UserInput -->|Filter| ApplyFilters UserInput -->|Search| SearchInput UserInput -->|Sort| SelectSort UserInput -->|Browse| DisplayParts ApplyFilters --> FilterResults FilterResults --> DisplayParts SearchInput --> SearchResults SearchResults --> DisplayParts SelectSort --> SortResults SortResults --> DisplayParts DisplayParts --> UserAction UserAction -->|View Details| ViewDetails UserAction -->|Load More| LoadMore UserAction -->|Reset| ResetFilters UserAction -->|Change Category| SelectCategory UserAction -->|Exit| End ViewDetails --> End LoadMore --> DisplayParts ResetFilters --> LoadAllParts
